Package es.outlook.adriansrj.cv.api.vehicle.controller

Class VehicleController.Factory

java.lang.Object
es.outlook.adriansrj.cv.api.vehicle.controller.VehicleController.Factory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeyed
Enclosing class:
VehicleController
public abstract static class VehicleController.Factory extends Object implements IDeyed
Works in conjunction with the VehicleControllerFactoryRegistry;
This is the class to be used by developers for creating custom controllers. You would just create and register an instance of this that creates the instance of your custom controller.

  • Method Details

    • getControllerId

      @NotNull public abstract @NotNull String getControllerId()
      Gets the id of the controller associated with this factory.
      The VehicleControllersConfiguration class will find this factory in the registry using this id.
      Returns:
      id of the controller associated with this factory.

    • createInstance

      @NotNull public abstract @NotNull VehicleController createInstance(@NotNull @NotNull Vehicle vehicle, @Nullable @Nullable VehicleControllerProperties properties)
      Creates a new instance of the specific vehicle controller this factory represents.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle that the controller will manage.
      properties - Optional properties to customize the controller's behavior. If null, default properties will be used.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the vehicle controller, fully configured for the given vehicle and properties.
